item.title: Judge Declines Trump DOJ Request to Unseal Epstein Grand Jury Testimony
item.description: The Justice Department could appeal the ruling, but doing so would be foolish.

item.title: Have Democrats Forgotten How to Do Politics?
item.description: Their reaction to Trump’s D.C. police takeover is unconvincing.

item.title: D.C.’s Problems Require a Long-Term Fix
item.description: While President Trump has the power to deploy the National Guard to the capital, it is not necessarily wise.

item.title: Inventing Climate Liability: An International Court’s Big Adventure
item.description: Climate adaptation and mitigation require technological innovation and economic growth, not legal warfare between nations.
